mapper.select: select a.company_no , a.contract_no , a.contract_name , a.contract_div , a.start_date , a.end_date from contract as a inner join company as b on a.company_no = b.company_no where a.company_no = #{companyNo};
select plan_id , plan_kname , plan_ename , flat_div from ts_plan where odm_div = 'N';
select a.contract_no , a.license_no from license as a inner join contract as b on a.contract_no = b.contract_no where a.contract_no = #{contractNo};
select a.contract_no , a.odm_seq from odm_contract as a inner join contract as b on a.contract_no = b.contract_no where a.contract_no = #{contractNo};
select a.contract_no , a.ship_seq , a.ship_name from ships_contract as a inner join contract as b on a.contract_no = b.contract_no where a.contract_no = #{contractNo};

select a.company_no , b.company_name , a.contract_no , a.contract_name , a.contract_date , a.contractor , a.contract_service , a.contract_div , a.contract_period , a.start_date , a.end_date , a.monetary_unit , a.exchange_rate , a.contract_manager , a.remark from contract as a inner join company as b on a.company_no = b.company_no where a.company_no = #{companyNo};

select a.company_no , b.company_name , a.contract_no , a.contract_name , a.contract_date , a.contractor , a.contract_service , a.contract_div , a.contract_period , a.start_date , a.end_date , a.monetary_unit , a.exchange_rate , a.contract_manager , a.remark from contract as a inner join company as b on a.company_no = b.company_no where a.contract_no = #{contractNo};

select contract_no , license_no , license_type , license_div , license_count , start_date , end_date , unit_price , amount , discounted_amount , actual_amount from license where contract_no = #{contractNo};
select contract_no , odm_seq , odm_cont_div , pay_currency , pay_unit , pay_term_mo , unit_price , apply_date from odm_contract where contract_no = #{contractNo};

select a.contract_no , a.ship_seq , a.ship_name , a.imo_no , a.equip_lent , a.apply_start_date , a.apply_finish_date , a.cancel_yn , a.cancel_date , b.plan_seq , b.plan_id from ships_contract as a inner join (select c.contract_no, c.ship_seq, c.plan_seq, c.plan_id from apply_plan as c where c.contract_no = #{contractNo} and c.plan_seq = (select max(d.plan_seq) from apply_plan as d where d.contract_no = c.contract_no and d.ship_seq = c.ship_seq)) as b on a.contract_no = b.contract_no and a.ship_seq = b.ship_seq where a.contract_no = #{contractNo};
